ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Question for Rokenn
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay, next question.  Anyone know the trick to get the blades to leave? Or any clue as to how this might be done? Elwyn ... From: Reeves, Patrick W
ygData.messageBody:
Okay, next question. Anyone know the "trick" to get the blades to leave?
Or any clue as to how this might be done?


Elwyn

-----Original Message-----
From: Reeves, Patrick W [mailto:pwr3@...]
Sent: Wednesday, March 15, 2000 10:31 AM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Question for Rokenn


From: "Reeves, Patrick W" <pwr3@...>

We had tried pulling Dojorn to the 3rd isle with no luck as well (back in
the levitating days of Air). Now we take him on on his own isle. One of
the Paladin's in our guild has found a way to trick the two Bladestorms into
leaving the island so we are able to fight Dojorn solo. I will try to
observe his techinique next time he go up there. The full loot list from
Dojorn last night was a Warrior haste belt, Golden Efreeti Bow (ranger quest
item), and Golden Efreeti Greeves. On our first Dojorn kill we got 4 items
but 3 rotted due to confusion in the post-kill rezing order. This time we
did pre-lotto rolls per class for whatever dropped, saved alot of trouble in
that precious 8 mins post-kill time.

Also Dojorn is pretty much immune to magic. So it is melee, melee, melee.
Our group got waxed as BOTH our healers went LD as soon as the battle
started :( We had about 45 people there I believe.

Rokenn
